import React from "react"; import PropTypes from "prop-types"; import {Router,Link } from "react-router-dom"; import styles from "./styles.module.scss"; import iron_1 from "../../images/iron_1.png" import iron_2 from "../../images/iron_2.png" import iron_3 from "../../images/iron_3.png" import iron_4 from "../../images/iron_4.png" import bronze_1 from "../../images/bronze_1.png" import bronze_2 from "../../images/bronze_2.png" import bronze_3 from "../../images/bronze_3.png" import bronze_4 from "../../images/bronze_4.png" import silver_1 from "../../images/silver_1.png" import silver_2 from "../../images/silver_2.png" import silver_3 from "../../images/silver_3.png" import silver_4 from "../../images/silver_4.png" import gold_1 from "../../images/gold_1.png" import gold_2 from "../../images/gold_2.png" import gold_3 from "../../images/gold_3.png" import gold_4 from "../../images/gold_4.png" import platinum_1 from "../../images/platinum_1.png" import platinum_2 from "../../images/platinum_2.png" import platinum_3 from "../../images/platinum_3.png" import platinum_4 from "../../images/platinum_4.png" import diamond_1 from "../../images/diamond_1.png" import diamond_2 from "../../images/diamond_2.png" import diamond_3 from "../../images/diamond_3.png" import diamond_4 from "../../images/diamond_4.png" import master from "../../images/master_1.png" import grandmaster from "../../images/grandmaster_1.png" import challenger from "../../images/challenger_1.png" import { ComposedChart, Line, XAxis, YAxis, CartesianGrid, Tooltip, Legend, } from 'recharts'; import Navigation from "../Navigation"; import ReactLoading from 'react-loading'; const Summoner = (props, context) => (
{!props.loading && (
{props.mmr.summoner_name=="null" &&(
{props.summonername}님의
mmr을 찾을 수 없습니다.
※ 솔로 랭크 기준으로 계산됩니다. 진행한 게임의 수가 적은 경우 mmr 계산이 불가 할 수 있습니다.※
)} {props.mmr.summoner_name!="null" && (
{props.mmr[0].summoner_name}'s MMR
)}
)} {props.loading &&(
{props.summonername}님의
정보를 불러오는 중입니다.
)} {!props.loading && props.mmr.summoner_name!="null" && (
※ 솔로 랭크 기준으로 계산됩니다. 듀오 게임이 많은 경우 부정확 할 수 있습니다. ※
MMR TO TIER : Silver 1 85LP
MY MMR : 1330
티어 평균 MMR보다 10 높습니다.
MMR 변화 그래프
)}
); Summoner.propTypes = { loading: PropTypes.bool.isRequired, data : PropTypes.array.isRequired, summonername : PropTypes.string.isRequired, mmr : PropTypes.array.isRequired, }; export default Summoner;
